page.title: 03NATIONAL EXHIBITION CENTRE
page.content: THE N.E.C. IS VERY VERSATILE COMPLEX. IT HAS 10 HALLS THE SMALLEST 1305m.sq THE LARGEST 2400m.sq.THE N.E.C HAS THE BEST POSSIBLE ACCESS WITH BIRMINGHAM INTERNATIONAL STATION,THE AIRPORT AND THE M42,M5,M6.THE N.E.C. IS VERY COMPUTERISED. WHEN A TELEPHONE IS NEEDED THEY CAN WIRE IT UP IN A FEW MINUTES.THE WHOLE OF THE N.E.C COVERS 400 ACRES.THE CITY OF BIRMINGHAM OWNS THE N.E.C.THE N.E.C. WAS BUILT FEBRUARY 1973 AND WAS FINISHED IN NOVEMBER 1975.AT PRESENT 30 BIG EVENTS AND 40 EXHIBITIONS TAKE PLACE EACH YEAR.MAJOR EXHIBITIONS LAST UP TO TEN DAYS.330 STAFF ARE EMPLOYED THEY CATER FOR 50,000 PEOPLE PER DAY.THE LAKE BY THE SIDE IS CALLED PENDIGO LAKE.IT IS 10ft DEEP.THEY SOMETIMES DO WATERSPORTS ON IT.HALL 7 THE ARENA IS USED FOR CONCERTS,SHOWS, SPORTS EVENTS.IT SEATS 12,000.
